item.description:
Flyby News & The Awareness Initiative

present:

Dark Legacy - JFK & 9-11

(58 minutes running time)

+

THRIVE

Remix (and edit) by Chris Pratt

Entitled: Perceptions

(30 minutes running time)

 

FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

Dark Legacy - JFK and 9-11 - (short version) – 58 minutes

New film captures the spirit of conspiracies while facing reality.

Produced by Flyby News at Greenfield Community Television

Contact: Jonathan Mark; Email noflyby[AT}yahoo.com – www.FlybyNews.com

 

Dark Legacy - JFK and 9-11 is a film compilation that tackles four major conspiracies of our times: the JFK assassination, Federal Reserve, Apollo lunar missions, and 9-11. Once you break through into an evidence-based reality into any of these conspiracies, identifying a cover-up becomes simple. It is only spin and fear that keeps many lurking in the shadows of truth, meanwhile the system is closing in on itself. This November 22, 2013 marks 50 years since the assassination of JFK. Watching John Hankey's film: "Dark Legacy: George Bush and the Murder of John F. Kennedy," one can gain insight on what his assassination meant to our world.


The new 58 minute film concentrates the original almost two and a half hour version, and begins with the central theme that President Kennedy was murdered for a coup d'etat. The next clip is on the secret birth of the Federal Reserve, which will mark its 100th anniversary in December, 2013. This system enabled global financiers to become Masters of the Universe. Then the film bravely shows evidence that the Apollo lunar missions were staged. The film then slips into  a music-video with Steppenwolf's 1969 classic, "Monster,” following is a clip on the National Citizens' Initiative for Democracy. This could be the best plan for democracy to evolve for we, the people. Part two in this version covers the events of September 11 in Chile and in the US.

Jonathan Mark is offering a free DVD to anyone wanting to review it to broadcast at their local community access television station. He encourages people to burn copies to share with family and friends in 'fair use' since it does use copyright protected material. Flyby News' fair use policy is posted near the bottom at FlybyNews.com

 

 

Perception - Complementing this video recompilation and remix is a hybrid of the Thrive movie and a remix called “Perception.” The remix begs the question Global Domination or Global Consciousness? It is being released in concert with a magazine called QC (Questions of Conscience) and a TV series for PEG TV called “Lies and Liars”. Episode 1 of this series has already played to well over 1 million households.Episode 2 will be released in January along with QCmagazine.


THRIVE is an unconventional documentary that lifts the veil on what's REALLY going on in our world by following the money upstream -- uncovering the global consolidation of power in nearly every aspect of our lives. Weaving together breakthroughs in science, consciousness and activism, THRIVE offers real solutions, empowering us with unprecedented and bold strategies for reclaiming our lives and our future.

 

 

You can also watch films Online:

Dark Legacy: JFK & 9/11
